text: There was a double dose of drama in the #BPL on Sunday - @MCFC closed the gap on @chelseafc while @SpursOfficial stole a march on @Everton
Referee appointments have been made for #BPL Matchweek 15 (6-8 Dec). See full list: http://t.co/J4A8nS10by http://t.co/tJxt6ViQXG
ON THIS DAY in 2006, @Arsenal won the first north London derby at the Emirates Stadium: http://t.co/7B7kDOSEyM http://t.co/OojmYD7fQ8
Who scored the best goal in #BPL Matchweek 13? You said @Persie_Official in our online poll. Thanks for voting! http://t.co/cXbrQwussw
TEAM NEWS Three changes for @stokecity as Ireland, Assaidi and Bardsley replace Sidwell, Walters and Arnautovic #MUNSTK
KICK-OFF And we're now under way at Selhurst Park and The Hawthorns in the two 8pm matches #CRYAVL #WBAWHU http://t.co/IP54Tx1XHX
PHOTO Leonardo Ulloa celebrates @OfficialFOXES's opener. It's now Leicester 1-1 Liverpool (44 mins) #LEILIV http://t.co/oYUwbTH8Xu
GOAL Leicester 1-2 Liverpool (54 mins) Gerrard arrives late in the box to steer into the corner after Leicester fail to clear #LEILIV
FULL-TIME Man Utd 2-1 Stoke. Marouane Fellaini and Juan Mata make it four #BPL wins in a row for @ManUtd #MUNSTK http://t.co/HJ6DEsiQ35
Steven Gerrard: "I am happy with the goal, even more pleased with the win. We are on the way up." #LEILIV http://t.co/nE1t0BPii3
"Rooney has to have a scan on Wednesday, then we know more. I'm very pleased Di Maria's injury is not so heavy" - Van Gaal on #MUFC injuries
"Outstanding" - @LFC boss Brendan Rodgers praises Steven Gerrard. Tuesday's reaction: http://t.co/NPdDFX0Nsz http://t.co/awOMY3WjKs
WATCH The managers are ready for Wednesday's #BPL action. Hear what they have to say: http://t.co/6fnF5k3Iy8
.@Stevo_football has made his predictions for tonight at http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V Tell us yours! http://t.co/hOGM1AtusB
PHOTO Drogba now has 4 goals & 5 assists in his last 9 #BPL games v Spurs. Chelsea 2-0 Spurs (35 mins) #CHETOT http://t.co/UIzuKmB3OF
GOAL Sunderland 1-4 Man City (71 mins) It's Aguero again! The Argentine gets ahead of his marker to sidefoot home Milner's cross #SUNMCI

14 - Sergio Aguero 
11 - Diego Costa
9 - Alexis Sanchez
7 - Saido Berahino, Charlie Austin http://t.co/vEopsKpnTm
Arsenal 1-0 Saints. The Gunners snatch victory through Alexis's 9th #BPL goal of the season: http://t.co/YvpJvhDSRF http://t.co/N9s5QuamVK
Our tactics expert @adrianjclarke looks back to #LEILIV and hails @sterling31's impact. More: http://t.co/greOPYd0lR http://t.co/KVcwlwrhb1
.@chelseafc & @LFC U12s will compete at the Christmas Truce Tournament in Ypres. Full line-up: http://t.co/U47B23M5AN http://t.co/BXjKRPq3tj
FIVE STAR The only players to hit 5 #BPL goals in a single match are featured on Day 5 of our Advent Calendar... http://t.co/IYpxFO4zD0
Frank Lampard has 174 #BPL goals - one more will move him to fourth on the all-time list with @ThierryHenry #MCIEVE http://t.co/ZSJZOCidNW
Will @LFC make it 3 #BPL wins in a row when @SunderlandAFC visit on Saturday? Full preview: http://t.co/vDXYo8FNEs http://t.co/9pKKrIpha8
The Gameweek 15 #FPL deadline is near - is this man the answer to your problems? Scout Extra: http://t.co/EtyJL1Blm7 http://t.co/NoRxdOFsep
"Perez gives us something a little bit different that might cause Chelsea problems. I hope so" - Alan Pardew #NEWCHE http://t.co/QjweJK4cRy
PHOTO @CissePapiss celebrates his 6th #BPL goal of the season. Newcastle 1-0 Chelsea (74 mins) #NEWCHE http://t.co/m893VGkLwZ
TEAM NEWS 2 changes for @SpursOfficial see Chiriches & Lennon make way for Dier & Soldado. Ledley comes in for Gayle in @CPFC's only change
PHOTO @petercrouch gives @stokecity the lead after just 19 seconds. It's Stoke 1-0 Arsenal after 20 mins #STKARS http://t.co/5VOjbg1roI
PENALTY to Arsenal... (68 mins) #STKARS
FULL-TIME QPR 2-0 Burnley. @QPRFC move out of the bottom three with their third win in four #BPL home matches #QPRBUR http://t.co/XD8mERNM9O
SUB @aguerosergiokun has suffered an early injury at the Etihad and has to be replaced after 7 minutes. Jose Pozo comes on #MCIEVE
SUB Jose Pozo, who replaced Aguero after 7 mins, now comes off for Dzeko on 63 mins. Man City 1-0 Everton #MCIEVE
TABLE @MCFC move to within 3 pts of leaders @chelseafc after Saturday's action. Here's how things stand in the #BPL http://t.co/5oMrkqxi0H
WATCH @Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger on #STKARS: "We gave them a really good present." http://t.co/5x2KNNtXf3
WATCH "We were altogether a bit soft to cope with what they offered us." - Arsene Wenger on #STKARS: http://t.co/5x2KNNtXf3
LIVE NOW We're looking back at Saturday in the @carlsberg Live Match Centre. Get involved: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/SGfFfCFuMO
GOAL West Ham 1-1 Swansea (41 mins). Jenkinson crosses and Carroll hangs in the air to beat Fabianski with a looping header #WHUSWA
SUB @SwansOfficial make a second change on 75 mins - @BafGomis replaces @JeffMONTERO23. West Ham 2-1 Swansea #WHUSWA
KICK-OFF @AVFCOfficial v @OfficialFOXES is up and running. Don't miss a kick: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN #AVLLEI http://t.co/6EC2x0QCuz
SUB @OfficialFOXES make a second change - Jamie Vardy makes way for Chris Wood on 66 mins. Villa 1-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
